name: QSS Global
description: QSS Global LLP with over 650 International clients (including a large number of Fortune 500 companies) working in India, SEA, and APAC region focuses on creating sustainable relationships with our clients while exceeding client expectations through trust and transparency in our work.
features: One-stop Solution for All Organizational Services
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Trustworthy and Reliable
ShortDescription: QSS GLOBAL SA is an recrutiment and business cosultation services provider.
enhanced_description: QSS Global, established in 2009 and headquartered in Delhi, is an international recruitment and business consultation services provider. They serve over 650 international clients, including a significant number of Fortune 500 companies, across India, Southeast Asia (SEA), and the Asia-Pacific (APAC) region. QSS Global aims to be a one-stop solution for various organizational services, building sustainable relationships through trust and transparency.
key_use_cases: Overall business strategy and operational consultation
Seeking a single provider for multiple organizational service needs
competitive_advantages: Extensive experience with over 650 international clients, including Fortune 500 companies
Strong regional expertise in India, SEA, and APAC markets
Commitment to trust and transparency in client relationships
Positioned as a 'one-stop solution' for organizational services
Focus on building sustainable client relationships
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
